quote: Happiness is the pleasantest of emotions; because of this, it is the most dangerous. Having once felt happiness, one will do anything to maintain it, and losing it, one will grieve.
quote_letters: HAPPINESS IS THE PLEASANTEST OF EMOTIONS BECAUSE OF THIS IT IS THE MOST DANGEROUS HAVING ONCE FELT HAPPINESS ONE WILL DO ANYTHING TO MAINTAIN IT AND LOSING IT ONE WILL GRIEVE
